vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ψαλ-μός, ὁ,
twitching or twanging with the fingers, ψαλμοὶ τόξων [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II mostly of musical strings, πηκτίδων ψαλμοῖς κρέκον ὕμνον [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II.2 the sound of the cithara or harp, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; there were contests in τὸ ψάλλειν, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__II.3 later, song sung to the harp, psalm, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: Psalms (book of or section of OT); psalm, hymn of praise
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
Psalms (book of or section of OT); psalm, hymn of praise
